description.title: GnuPG is the GNU project's complete and free implementation of the OpenPGP standard as defined by RFC4880.
description.paragraph: GnuPG allows to encrypt and sign your data and communication, features a versatile key management system as well as access modules for all kinds of public key directories. GnuPG, also known as GPG, is a command line tool with features for easy integration with other applications. A wealth of frontend applications and libraries are available. Version 2 of GnuPG also provides support for S/MIME.
